Summaries.eng: The Golden Bat, a masked vigilante, opposes evil at every turn in the battle for justice
Summaries.jpn: 黄金バット』（おうごんバット）は、昭和の初期の紙芝居のタイトルロールの主人公。金色の骸骨の姿をし、漆黒のマントを身にまとう。昭和40年代に漫画・映画・テレビアニメ化された。 スーパーヒーローとアンチヒーローの両面をもつ孤高の主人公であり、一般的には死の象徴として忌避される髑髏をモチーフにしたヒーローという点で、その存在が斬新だった。特有の「高笑い」と共に現れる、金色の

Summaries.eng: An anomalous climate suddenly turns cold in tropical regions, with icebergs appearing in the South Pacific. Dr. Yamatone, investigating the causes, discovers that someone has been using a device to block the flow of warm currents and inject cold currents from the Antarctic. Meanwhile, Takeru and his team, who were investigating the incident, are captured by the evil scientist Nazeau and almost turned into food for the fish monster Mammoth Killer. When Marie's tears turn into bats, the golden bat appears again!

In a quiet village surrounded by mountains, Mazo, Nazo's man, appears and orders the villagers to build a secret base and a giant destroyer robot, Gegeorg. A boy is thrown into the air during construction and Doctor Yamatone's supercar protects him. When the word "Nazo" comes out of the boy's mouth, Doctor Yamatone discovers that Erich Nazo, a world-famous scientist who disappeared 40 years ago, is behind the terrible events that have been taking place for some time.

Dr. Yamatone's secret document "103", to be presented at the World Congress of Scientists, is stolen by Nazo's subordinate, No. 23. Takeru and Marie ask the Golden Bat to retrieve it, but Nazo intercepts it with his robot giant, Gegeorg. Takeru and Marie ask the Golden Bat to retrieve it, but Nazo intercepts the Bat with his giant robot, Gegeorg. The Bat manages to infiltrate Nazo's Tower, but realizing that he cannot move without water, Nazo finally manages to lock the Bat in a powerful drying chamber. What will be Bat's fate?

Doctor Yamatone and his team are invited to transform a barren, uninhabited island in South America into an earthly paradise. Nazo, who wants to make the island his secret base, uses his subordinate No. 5 to spray a mysterious gas on the carnivorous plants, causing them to grow to gigantic sizes. Engineer Ringo, who is not happy with the Japanese cooperation, suspects that Doctor Yamatone is behind the changes to the plants. Finally, the giant plants attack the development team and the Golden Bat appears in an absolutely fatal crisis.

On Daleo's birthday, a gift is delivered from an unknown sender. Inside, a melon emerges which, to Daleo's surprise, grows larger and larger, swallowing one metal object after another, including belt buckles and door handles. The city is thrown into chaos as the melon rolls, absorbing cars and even trains. Supercar and Golden Bat manage to drown him with their coordinated play, but the melon starts working again.・・・・・・ What is the solution?

Dr. Yamatone installs a device that sprays water with a special chemical and tries to turn the Sahara Desert into a large plantation. But Nazo appears and uses the Sand Wraith to turn humans into sand in an instant. Repelled with the help of the Golden Bat, Nazo kidnaps Takeru and Marie and forces the doctor to hand over the Great Plantation. Daleo, disguised as Nazeau's servant, sneaks into the tower to save them both.・・・・・・

An international city built in the Siberian tundra by the world's best scientists. Doctor Yamatone and his team visit Doctor Leo's observatory, but it has been ransacked in the meantime. Nazo's flying saucer team abducted the space creature Arigon, which Doctor Leo brought back from the planet. The Arigon, which has become enormous due to radiation, attacks the cosmopolitan city! Arigon is docile thanks to the work of the Golden Bat, but a debate arises between citizens and scientists about what to do with the child.

On isolated islands here and there, rivers containing gold sand evaporate overnight. Doctor Yamatone is searching for the golden island for South Taiping, but is caught in a flood. When he returns to the river after the waters have receded, he finds a giant silkworm monster. Supercar gets entangled in the gold threads sprayed by the silkworms, but is saved by the golden bat. He follows the path of Gegeorg of Nazo, who came to retrieve the golden cocoons produced by silkworms, and finds them there.・・・・・・

An experiment conducted by Dr. Yamatone and Dr. Paloma to raise a vein of uranium lying on the seabed has successfully created the world's largest producer of the atomic fuel uranium-X. However, Nazo immediately appears and uses robots to set the island on fire. Thanks to the Golden Bat, Marie manages to escape for a while, but this time she is sucked into a terrifying vessel developed by Mazo that turns everything into smoke. Takeru comes to the rescue with his robot Happy.

A truck carrying the "Finkamen", an important cultural treasure discovered in Egypt, is attacked by a masochist and his men. The emerald on the Finkamen's forehead contains the location of the treasure of the Egyptian pyramids. Doctor Barbara and Doctor Yamatone go to the pyramids, but they already find Nazo's men there and Doctor Barbara's friend, Doctor Collector, who, dazzled by the antiquities, collaborates with Nazo!

Scientists attending an international peace conference in New York suddenly burst into laughter. Only Dr. Yamatone and Dr. Singer, who did not eat mushrooms for lunch, escaped the accident. Shortly after, the same damage occurs again and Dr. Yamatone and his team go to the mushroom production area to investigate, but are attacked by the dreaded mushrooms. They were the end result of people who had been poisoned by mushrooms.・・・・・・

A group of masochists searches for five mutant boys living in the Himalayas. They finally find them, but they are mischievous and undisciplined. So they negotiate with their mother, the Snow Woman, to obtain her cooperation. In fact, Nazo needs people capable of operating at a constant temperature to conquer the space station. As proof for the boys, Nazo wants them to take the painting from the museum, which is protected by cryogenic radio waves. But Marie is there.・・・・・・

After a meeting at the world's largest nuclear power plant, Dr. Yamatone's car is attacked by a mysterious black cat! The black cat keeps appearing here and there. Doctor Yamatone and his team are attacked by the black cat again, but the golden bat saves them and leaves them the message "Don't shoot the black cat". The black cat is actually a robot invented by Nazo, with a high-performance bomb inside. The black cat finally sneaks into the nuclear power plant and, if he is shot by a security guard, risks a huge explosion!

Commander Black, who controls Nazo's new rocket rocket, is arrogant and ignores Nazo's orders. Doctor Yamatone and his team follow the rocket in a supercar, hoping to find Nazo's headquarters, but are attacked by the monster Subgon in a location similar to the continent of Atlantis. The group escapes the situation with the help of the Golden Bat, but the doctor is captured by the masochists. Takeru sneaks into the cemetery in collaboration with Cusco, who is forced to work in an underground factory.

Girton, a rockman with terrifying powers created by masochists, attacks a dam built in the Bering Strait. Ghilton is repelled by the Golden Bat when he gets very close, but Mazo is undeterred and transplants the brain of Hyman, a man who had come to work at the dam, into Ghilton, forcing him to attack the dam again. Just then, Tyrol, Hyman's daughter, visits the dam in search of her father. Tyrol calls Ghilton as he fights the bat.・・・・・・

Trains and ships disappear all over the world. At the same time, Dr. Yamatone is assigned by the International Alliance headquarters to guard a warehouse where atomic and hydrogen bombs are stored around the world. The reason is that someone stole a map showing their location. The culprit is actually Nazo, who wants to eradicate the H-bomb warehouses using the Galgar, a monstrous bird that emits anti-gravity rays from its eyes. The previous incident was just a test for this purpose!

Dr. Yamatone and his team were searching for a crystal of great value to humanity, called the "Star of Polynesia", at the ancient Polynesian ruins of Easter Island. But then the Sittans appear, rulers of the underworld, who say they want to take the "Star of Polynesia" to conquer the earth. The doctors are attacked by their monsters, but are saved by a golden bat. The facility is destroyed by bats and the Sittans are in trouble, but Nazo offers to help them.・・・・・・

Black Specter is said to have once equaled Fantaman in power on the continent of Atlantis. When Nazo learns of the legend, he retrieves a coffin from the underwater ruins of Atlantis and brings him back to life. Black Ghost is a great villain who doesn't even fear Nazo, but Nazo scares him with a sealing spell and tames Black Ghost. The real Ghostman finally appears before Black Ghost, who disguises himself as Ghostman, kidnaps Dareo and does all sorts of evil !

Daleo receives a blue ball from an old man who is being chased by someone. This is Cobalt 70, an essential element of the underwater "Land of the Blue Flame". His pursuers are the Dagoni, the oppressed aquatic people of the land, who had intended to ask Nazeau to help them in their civil war in exchange for the sphere, but the old scholar had stolen it from them first. The Dagoni used a tool called the Mirage Pen to make giant centipedes and poisonous spiders appear and attack the Daleos.

Takeru is kidnapped by the aquatic inhabitants of the "Land of the Blue Flame"! Dr. Yamatone and his team crack the "Rout Sigma" code left by the aquatic inhabitants, find an entrance to the underwater country, and infiltrate. At the same time, Nazo, who cannot give up Cobalt 70, which can produce countless hydrogen bombs, sends his masochists to the Land of the Blue Flame. The country's queens consider the humans on the surface a dangerous threat to their style of life and try to execute Takeru as a start.

A team led by Nazo's subordinate, Goras, stole a meteorite with powerful energy, the Dragon Stone, from a laboratory at the foot of the Peron volcano. Nazo intended to use it to build Dragon missiles in his factory. Goras is restrained by Doctor Yamatone and his team and, disappointed by Nazo's attempt to kill him with a bomb, reveals the location of his secret base. However, he is told that there is a terrifying monster there, the Kender.

On the night of the storm, Nazo's minion Black Mask appears in Dr. Harlo's laboratory and steals the notebook with the chemical equation for the hurricane bomb. Doctor Yamatone, who has the notebook with the other half of the equation, is summoned by telephone by the Scientific Director to Doctor Harlo's mountain villa, but it is a false call and Black Mask is waiting for him. The monster Nekky attacks Fantaman, who appears to save the doctor!

When Dr. Yamatone and his team learn that the ruby, which has accumulated Earth's magnetism, is in a sunken German submarine, they dive into the Sargasso, known as the graveyard of the sea. But Nazo's men also arrived there. As the two sides face off, the ruby's power activates and the submarine explodes. Marie, who was caught in the middle, is pulled out in front of Nazzo, but she is so close to Ruby who has developed psychic powers that even Nazzo's rays are ineffective!

Dr. Yamatone invents the ATG, a nuclear bomb that emits no radiation. Since he needs good engineers for mass production, he decides to mobilize the robots of the Müller company. The robots take over the ATG factory and begin producing the bomb, which they cannot casually attack due to the possibility of an ATG explosion. Takeru disguises himself as a robot and sneaks into the factory.

The uranium was stolen from the science center by Nazo's man, Boldo. Furthermore, all the uranium is the type needed to make the dreaded gold bomb. Following a map provided by Fantaman, who appeared in Marie's dream, Takeru and Daleo infiltrate Nazo's secret factory. Doctor Yamatone intends to launch a missile at the factory on their signal, but Boldo thwarts them. Help, Fantaman!

Takeru and Daleo went for a drive in the suburbs, but were attacked by Nazeau's gang and their car fell into a cliff. Notified of the emergency, Dr. Yamatone and Marie, worried, go to the site, in the Tarante valley. There, however, Gem, Nazo's minion determined to take revenge on Fantaman, was waiting for them with his hands tied! He has hidden the Tarangue monster in the fountain and is trying to gather Fantaman, Doctor Ghemu and the others.

A whistle blows on a moonlit night and, one by one, all the most important scientists are attacked. Castania's queen, Axis, whose son was stolen by an alchemist in the distant past, has survived for 500 years and is now targeting modern-day alchemists/scientists for revenge. Nazo inflames the queen and reveals that it was Doctor Yamatone who took the child. Axis shows up and faces Fantaman with the skeletal monster Scarpa.

Space bats attack space stations and take away food. Doctor Yamatone, Takeru and his team travel to space to solve the case, but they too are attacked by space bats and become stranded. Takeru goes on a spacewalk to repair his supercar, but his lifeline is cut by Nazo's men and he is thrown into space. Fantaman takes him to a base where space bats and space monsters are kept!

Nazo and his gang team up with the emerging Blackstar nation to disrupt the Olympics and assassinate the prime ministers of various countries. Takeru, who has already noticed the disturbing developments, falls into Nazo's hands and is almost transformed into a modified human. Meanwhile, snipers are deployed at the event site, where the unusual performance of the Black Star athletes has caused chaos. Additionally, the monster Ugangi is summoned to fight Fantaman.

For 690 years, a venerable castle has stood on Cape Trant. Nazo wants to build a fortress that will conquer the world, but Matthew, the old man who guards the castle, refuses to cooperate. Nazeau, in frustration, secretly sends Mazo to the castle and tries to conquer it by force. However, a liquid ghost monster that has guarded the castle for generations lives there. The monster goes crazy and attacks Takeru and his friends who are visiting the castle!

A special radio wave caused a series of explosions around the world. The source of the radio waves is the Kingdom of Baron, surrounded by desert. Doctor Yamatone and his team go to the location to investigate the causes. However, the kingdom is in the midst of a struggle for the throne and the population is impoverished and confused. Doctor Yamatone discovers that the radio waves are coming from a giant statue of the god Baron, which they worship. Nazo's shadow flickers. Takeru and his friends stand up to prevent the people from fighting.・・・・・・

While Takeru and Daleo were fishing, the earth suddenly shook and the eerie voices of a monster rang out. However, the figure is nowhere to be seen. In reality, Nazeau was testing the power of the transparent monster Glasgong. Doctor Yamatone and his team urgently take countermeasures after receiving a report from Takeru. It turns out that Glasgon is attracted to shiny objects. Takeru, his team and Fantaman work together to fight the invisible enemy. Will they have a chance?

Antarctic expeditions sent by many countries disappear one after another. Meanwhile, the water level in the ocean is gradually rising and the world is on the verge of a great flood. Dr. Yamatone, who believes the cause lies in Antarctica, flies to the region and finds that the icebergs are melting. A mysterious creature is melting the ice by radiating powerful electrical heat from its body. Fantaman, who discovered Nazo's plot and fought the monster, leaves behind a part of the monster's body as a clue.・・・・・・

A mountain thought to be an extinct volcano explodes. Doctor Yamatone, Takeru and his team go to the crater to investigate, but are attacked by the ferocious monster Mogler. The volcano's explosion was caused by the mistake of Nazo's lackey, Doctor Wolf, who had planned to blow up the entire planet. To prevent the plan from coming to fruition, Dr. Wolf and his team must dig 4,000 feet underground, where the base is suspected to be located.・・・・・・

Volcanic explosions of unknown origin continue to occur. To find a solution, Dr. Yamatone and his team visit the Geothermal Research Institute, but most of the researchers have already fled. After digging underground again with a drilling machine, the group finally reaches a cavity in the center of the earth. As they search for clues, Dr. Wolfe presses a button on a device that causes a huge explosion. Crisis at hand, what will be the fate of the Earth?

Mazo has a plan to strike the Sea Goblin nuclear submarine, which is sailing off the coast of Madagascar. The plan involves installing a transmitter and attacking the two-headed monster Geguera. Dr. Yamatone and his team are aboard the submarine during its test voyage. Takeru and Marie, impressed by the beauty of the sea, beg the captain to take them for a walk on the ocean floor and begin diving. However, a terrifying monster awaited them.・・・・・・

Fantaman arrives on an island inhabited by dinosaurs bred through hydrogen bomb testing and other activities, where he finds Marie's pendant. Marie had been kidnapped by Nazo's men and imprisoned on the island. The pendant has a mechanism that emits special radioactivity, which Doctor Yamatone and his team use as a clue to get to the island. Fantaman follows Marie to the Sulfur Valley. However, it was a trap set by Nazo and his friends!

A boy is chased by Nazo's men, but is saved by Takeru and Marie, who happen to be with him. The target is a letter and a photograph in the boy's possession. They were sent by his brother, who disappeared during an expedition in the Melba region as assistant to the geologist Crewe. The boy and Takeru go there and look for the shipment. However, the dark forest where the monsters live is marked only by an eerie skeletal trail.・・・・・・

Darkness dominates the land. The monster Basler, created with Dogmalon, is controlled by Nazo. The world is plunged into darkness and chaos due to the black cloud emitted by the monster. Doctor Yamatone, Takeru and his team rush to the vicinity of Mount Garo, which is believed to be the source of the cloud. However, they are interrupted by Po, a fortune teller who lives in the village and manipulates the inhabitants. In reality, Po is a subordinate assigned by Nazo to guard the monster.

Dr. Yamatne and his colleagues were visiting India for an international conference. Takeru and Marie received a small package from a monk lying on the road. It was a mysterious diamond, the "Queen of India". The diamond also contained plans for a secret base hidden by Nazo. Nazo's evil hand is approaching! After deciphering the drawings, the doctor and his team head towards the Warrior's Palace. However, the monster Gengaruru attacks Takeru and his team mercilessly.

Doctor Yamatone is attacked and injured by Nazo's disc. Takeru and Marie, entrusted with important documents, flee to the laboratory of geologist Julie. However, Takeru is taken prisoner and Marie, with the documents in her possession, wanders into the deep forest. Nazeau has Marie captured by an old witch living in the forest and relentlessly pursues her to find out where the documents are. Fantaman is going to save her, when the monster Heedlo, messenger of the Youba, appears before him!

Nazo is enraged by the failure of the operation and executes his men in cold blood. Out of fear of this, Mal, Nazo's secretary, runs away with a document containing the secrets of Nazo's Tower. He asks Dr. Yamatone and others for help. Mal is hunted by his pursuers and flees into an abandoned mine. To get in touch with him, Doctor Yamatone and his team also sneak into the abandoned mine, which however turns out to be the home of the One-Eyed Monster.・・・・・・

A robotic monster, Ligerman, was developed with the temperament of a lion, the strength of a gorilla, the intelligence of a human, and even chemical weapons. Dr. Yamatone and his team were traveling in the steppes of Kenya to investigate industrial development when the Ligerman caught up with them. The doctors are rescued with difficulty by ghostmen and rush towards their original destination, but on the way they come across a village where the river has dried up. The place hides another secret!

On a plane headed to Sao Paulo, a woman fires a machine gun. Naso, impressed by the woman, ruthless and extremely cruel, pairs her with Gustav, a master of monsters, and puts her to work. The idea is to steal a large sum of diamonds donated to the scientific community by the rich Sherlock. Sherlock, who works with Doctor Yamatone and his team, is threatened. And from the bottom of the ocean, the monster Fontamu chases Fantaman!

A letter written in hieroglyphics reaches Doctor Yamatone. In it he is warned that the extinct volcano Kemmler is about to explode. The volcano explodes as expected and the doctors travel to the site in a supercar. There, the letter's sender, Mu, takes the group on a guided tour, but Mu is actually an evil old woman who controls vampire bats. Mew kidnaps Marie and lures Fantaman. From the boiling lava comes the monstrous Shellgon!

Dr. Makino, the scientist who discovered Gerontium 90, which has the power to nullify gravitational forces, visits Dr. Yamatone. At that time, Makino had already been brainwashed and had become a pawn to lure Doctor Yamatone and his team. As they approach the Gerontium dig site, the earth cracks and a monster appears. Fantaman, who seems to want to exterminate the monsters, is devoured by them. What is the fate of Doctor Yamatone and Fantaman?

Doctor Haemodrix is ​​a disturbing figure who walks the dark side of the world. On the outside he is a scientist, but in reality he is a criminal who runs an assassination agency behind the scenes. Nazo introduces him to two guys who are the best assassins he's ever met. However, the two boys are not what they seem, but assassins with formidable strength and an evil heart. They sneak into Doctor Yamatone's house without any qualms and successfully kill him.・・・・・・

Unable to defeat Fantaman, the masochist uses a latest generation computer to unblock the situation. The result is that the bat monster, which lives deep in the Amazon, has a chance to win. The bat monster accepts Mazo's request and first kidnaps Marie. The first step is to kidnap Marie to lure Fantaman, Doctor Yamatone and Takeru to his fortress, the legendary "Castle of Death". It is a magical kingdom where terrifying monsters lurk!

A circus troupe is traveling when Gabler, a freak, suddenly goes crazy. Nazo spots the monster, which has the head of a rhinoceros and the body of a crocodile, and sets out to capture it alive. Gabler rampages through the circus headquarters and confronts Fantaman. Nazo's saucer intervenes and both are captured. Fantaman disappears! The monster is pulled from the seabed, reshaped and reappears at the circus.・・・・・・

The train Takeru and the others were on explodes on a railway bridge. The train escapes with Fantaman's help, but Takeru is captured by Nazzo and taken to the base. Naso had stolen the train's cargo of gold bars and intended to use them to build the base. Furthermore, he enlists the help of the witch Othello to resurrect Fantaman's rival, Black Ghost, from the Land of the Dead. Fantaman is in danger!

Takeru and Doctor Yamatone are determined and head towards the secret base completed by Nazo. They manage to infiltrate the base, but Nazo, on the contrary, takes them hostage. However, thanks to the resourcefulness of Doctor Yamatone and his team and Fantaman, the base begins to collapse. Nazo, enraged, transforms into a giant monster and attacks Fantman. Furthermore, Black Ghost, who was supposed to be dead, also appears and finally begins a final battle to the death in four-dimensional space!
